meanings.definition: The father of one's father or mother.
meanings.sent1: My grandfathers tell the best stories about the old days.
meanings.sent2: I visited my grandfathers over the weekend and helped them in the garden.
meanings.sent3: When my grandfathers start dancing, everyone joins in with laughter.
meanings.sent4: The wisdom of my grandfathers is a guiding light in my life.
meanings.sent5: The old photo of my grandfathers always brings back fond memories.

meanings.definition: To act as a grandfather to.
meanings.sent1: He grandfathers his grandchildren by taking them on adventures.
meanings.sent2: She grandfathers the kids by teaching them how to fish.
meanings.sent3: The dog grandfathers the little kittens by watching over them protectively.
meanings.sent4: The wise owl grandfathers the young birds in the forest, teaching them to fly.
meanings.sent5: The kind neighbor grandfathers the children in the community, always ready to lend a helping hand.
